casebody.data:
No. 10-6630. Jaime Avelar Castro, aka Jaime Avelar-Castro, Petitioner v. United States. 562 U.S. 1016, 131 S. Ct. 537,

178 L. Ed. 2d 394,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 8379. November 1, 2010.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit denied.

Same case below, 378 Fed. Appx. 314.
